original_text:
so that people may see and know,
    may consider and understand,
that the hand of the Lord has done this,
    that the Holy One of Israel has created it.
korean_text: 무리가 보고 여호와의 손이 지으신 바요 이스라엘의 거룩한 이가 이것을 창조하신 바인 줄 알며 함께 헤아리며 깨달으리라

sentences.original_text: that the hand of the Lord has done this
that the Holy One of Israel has created it
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘의 거룩하신 이가 이것을 만드셨다는 것을
